name: Kerri Thomas
review: I needed to purchase another iMac Pro, my other one was getting to slow. The Quality Macs team gave me a great buy back on my old iMac and a great price on a 2019 iMac Pro. They were very helpful and professional. I highly recommended them for you Apple computer needs.

name: Elena Conway
review: I've ordered two Macbooks so far and I will continue ordering more. Great deal and the two that I bought were like-new and a way better deal than ordering a brand new laptop. It also helps that you're 5 minutes from our HQ office!

name: Michael Pitts
review: I would buy a used Mac from these folks again. Quality products and a phone number where you can talk to their helpful sales people. My 2020 MacBook came as described, well packed and on time. I am supperb happy with this device.

name: Harper Ortiz
review: I bought this in April and it died yesterday 30 September. Sudden death syndrome... it was working perfectly then it was dead. I thought the charger wasn't charging but the light came on as it charged another Mac I have. I spent almost a hundred dollars a month for this thing to crash.

name: Natalie Cameron
review: Beautiful laptop. I’ve upgraded from the MacBook Air of old...so far this laptop has blown it away. It wasn’t overly pricey to be honest and I feel it’s worth the price. Overall look is great and keyboard feel is nice. Larger touchpad is great.

name: Turner Cunningham
review: Just poor customer service, their approved dealers aren't equiped to deal with issues so pointless left waiting with no computer for a warranty issue. no computer for a warranty issue. no computer for a warranty issue. I won't ever buy another apple product
